controller

Class StoreController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.StoreController

  • public final class StoreController
extends java.lang.Object
    StoreController is a controller class responsible for managing the view classes which operate with item and item related things. Makes requests to the api. Gets data and sends it to views. Listens to views inputs an act accordingly.
